duties_responsibilities.duty: Create high-quality 3D models, textures, and animations for characters, environments, props, and more.
Collaborate with the art director and design team to maintain and enhance the visual style of the game.
Ensure that all assets adhere to technical specifications and are optimized for real-time performance.
Participate in brainstorming sessions, providing creative insights and innovative solutions.
Work in coordination with other artists, animators, and developers to seamlessly integrate assets into the game engine.
Keep up to date with industry trends, tools, and techniques, and share knowledge with the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree in 3D Art, Animation, or related field
